data.message: It’s funny, a lot of people are saying that Eminem is no longer relevant and that he’s not as good as he was back then and that he sucks and all that shit, are just proving Eminem’s point that he made in this song. He knows that he set the bar high with his early work and that he might never reach that level of hype again. I applaud him for him releasing this song because he’s showing that he’s only human and that he know he won’t meet everyone’s expectations. The new music that he’s releasing is for the fans and those who just love music in general.

replies.message: Honestly some of his recent songs are some of my favorite (along with his some old). If you can appreciate his growth you can appreciate his new music
